Package jeroquest.units

Class Character

java.lang.Object
jeroquest.units.Character
All Implemented Interfaces:
Piece, GraphicElement
Direct Known Subclasses:
Hero, Monster
public abstract class Character
extends java.lang.Object
implements Piece, GraphicElement

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Character​(java.lang.String name, int movement, int attack, int defence, int body)
    Create a character from its name and its initial values for the attributes, initially its position is null (outside of the board)

  • Constructor Details

    • Character

      public Character​(java.lang.String name, int movement, int attack, int defence, int body)
      Create a character from its name and its initial values for the attributes, initially its position is null (outside of the board)
      Parameters:
      name - character's name
      movement - units of movement per turn
      attack - total of attack dices
      defence - total of defence dices
      body - body points

      public java.lang.String getName()
      Get the name
      Returns:
      the name of the character

    • isAlive

      public boolean isAlive()
      Checks if a character has any body points left
      Returns:
      true if it is alive, false otherwise

    • attack

      public int attack()
      Computes the number of impacts that the attack of the character will make, for that it rolls as many dices as dictated by the attribute attack
      Returns:
      the number of impacts made

    • combat

      public void combat​(Character c, Game currentGame)
      Simulates an combat with other character, it does the attack and the defence. If the attack kills the opponent it is moved out of the board
      Parameters:
      c - character being attacked
      currentGame - the current game

    • defend

      public abstract int defend​(int impacts)
      Defence from an attack (abstract method: each subclass must define its own behaviour)
      Parameters:
      impacts - total number of impacts to try to block or suffer
      Returns:
      the number of suffered wounds

    • isEnemy

      public boolean isEnemy​(Character c)
      Checks that the character given as argument is an enemy. An enemy is any character that is not of the same type
      Parameters:
      c - character to test the hostility
      Returns:
      true if it is an enemy

    • actionCombat

      public boolean actionCombat​(Game currentGame)
      Combat action for the character
      Parameters:
      currentGame - game in which the character has to act
      Returns:
      true if the character has to fight an enemy, false otherwise

    • actionMovement

      public int actionMovement​(Game currentGame)
      Movement action for the character
      Parameters:
      currentGame - game in which the character has to act
      Returns:
      the number of squares that it has moved

    • resolveTurn

      public void resolveTurn​(Game currentGame)
      AI: character's Artificial Intelligence It does the actions in a given turn: attack and movement
      Parameters:
      currentGame - game in which the character has to act

    • validTargets

      public DynamicVectorCharacters validTargets​(Game currentGame)
      Returns an array with the valid targets for this character
      Parameters:
      currentGame - the current game
      Returns:
      the valid targets for the character in its current position

    • isAtRange

      public boolean isAtRange​(XYLocation pos)
      Check if the character at position pos is at attack range
      Parameters:
      pos - position of the second character
      Returns:
      true is the squares are adjacent, false otherwise

    • validPositions

      public DynamicVectorXYLocation validPositions​(Game currentGame)
      Returns an array with the valid squares where a character can move directly from its current position:(N, S, E and W)
      Parameters:
      currentGame - game that contains the board and the characters
      Returns:
      the vector of positions (possibly free) where it can move
